full_summary:
================================>>(
### Floating Plant Dredging, Gulf Region N.B.

#### Announcement Title:
Floating Plant Dredging, Gulf Region N.B. (Escuminac, Botsford, Petit-Cap, Loggiecroft)

#### Notice Reference:
WS4442491215-Doc4442547141

#### Solicitation Number:
WS4442491215

#### Tender Closing Date:
 * Date: 2024-03-08
 * Time: 14:00:00 (local time)

#### Description:
The Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide floating plant dredging services for underwater materials at:
 - Escuminac Channel
 - Botsford Channel
 - Petit-Cap Channel
 - Loggiecroft Channel
The dredged material will be placed at designated ocean disposal sites at each wharf location in Westmorland and Kent Counties, Gulf Region New Brunswick.

#### Key Requirements:

* Work completion within 16 weeks of contract award.
* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
* Project location: Gulf Region New Brunswick.

#### Evaluation Criteria:

* Lowest Price

#### Contact Information:
For all inquiries, please contact Kate Mintzer (SPAC/PSPC) via the Messages function in SAP Ariba, at least 5 days prior to the closing date.

#### Submission Requirements:

* Proposals must be submitted through SAP Ariba.
* Services in English are available through the ITT issuing office: Atlantic Region Acquisitions.

#### Contract Details:

* Contract Start Date: 2024-03-25
* Contract End Date: None (indeterminate)

#### Protocol Language:

* English
* French (Official Language of Canada)

#### Important Notes:

* Site visit: Not scheduled. Public access available for independent visits.
* Bidders are encouraged to visit the site before submitting a bid.
